title: Brush Creek bounces back
creator_contributor_role: State of West Virginia, Dept of Commerce, production company

description: Illustrates how the Brush Creek Small Watershed Project converted the valley into an award winning example of good conservation practices. This enhanced land values, provided new recreation facilities and created new jobs.
